row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.JOB.SCALE_APPLICATION@GENERIC
row.description: Scale existing application in Cloud Foundry

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Instances" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_INSTANCES#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Disk limit" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_DISK_LIMIT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Memory limit" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_MEMORY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! ------------------------------------- VALIDATE WHETHER ATLEAST NO OF INSTANCES, DISK LIMIT OR MEMORY LIMIT IS PROVIDED --------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_APP_INPUTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_APP_INSTANCES#, &UC4RB_CF_APP_DISK_LIMIT#) : SET &UC4RB_CF_APP_INPUTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_APP_INPUTS#, &UC4RB_CF_APP_MEMORY#)
: IF &UC4RB_CF_APP_INPUTS# EQ "" : SET &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Please provide atleast one of the inputs: No of Instances, Disk limit or Memory limit." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : PRINT "&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#"
: ELSE
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ----------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO
: IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0
! ------------------------------------- PRINT EXISTING CONFIGURATION OF APPLICATION ---------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA# ="cf scale " ! Application name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#")
! Creation of CF Command to scale application : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# = &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA# ! No of Instances : IF &UC4RB_CF_APP_INSTANCES# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_APP_INSTANCES : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#, " -i &UC4RB_CF_APP_INSTANCES#") : ENDIF
! Disk Limit : IF &UC4RB_CF_APP_DISK_LIMIT# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_APP_DISK_LIMIT : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#, " -k &UC4RB_CF_APP_DISK_LIMIT#") : ENDIF
! Memory limit : IF &UC4RB_CF_APP_MEMORY# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_APP_MEMORY : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#, " -m &UC4RB_CF_APP_MEMORY#") : ENDIF
! Force restart of app without prompt : SET &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#, " -f")
! Execution of CF Command to print current configuration of application ! Logging CF Command : PRINT "EXECUTING CF SCALE COMMAND FOR CURRENT CONFIGURATION: &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF SCALE COMMAND FOR CURRENT CONFIGURATION: ", &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_APP_CLA# ! ------------------------------------- SCALING OF APPLICATION -------------------------------------------------------- ! If application does not exist we do not scale it : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( ! LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF SCALE COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF SCALE APP COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# ) ELSE ( SET ERRORS=1 ) : CASE "UNIX" execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -eq "0" ] then ! LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF SCALE COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF SCALE APP COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_CF_SCALE_NEW_CLA# else errors=1 fi : OTHER : ENDSWITCH : ENDIF
: ENDIF
!Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SCALE APPLICATION ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SCALE APPLICATION ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: !------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : ENDIF
